name: Two Colors: A Detective Story
description:
Created for the One Button Game jam hosted by Humble Toymaker Games.  we had to only use one input button and the theme had to be two colors.

CONTROLS:

The player moves towards the mouse cursor.

hold SPACE to search under rugs, in cabinets and more. 

Do you have what it takes to solve the case and bring the killer to justice ?

We made all the assets and coding from scratch over a week... I need a nap...
